testcase.title: 001)Check Chinese locale is displayed on RelatedContents for localization

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly and Locale Icon is Displayed

steps.title: the "HomePage" page should be loaded on log on with Locale Dropdown

I click on check all link
I click on check one link
I click on related content link
